title: Finalize STYO Tech Neon logo assets and correct frontend asset loading paths

requirements.summary: Add finalized background-free, optimized SVG Tech Neon logo variants (full + icon-only) with subtle/sharp vector glow and correct proportions.
acceptanceCriteria: All requested logo variants are present as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated/ (see imageRequirements filenames).
SVGs render crisply at small sizes (e.g., 32pxâ€“64px icon usage) and at large sizes (e.g., header logo) without distortion or pixelation.
SVG markup uses vector shapes/gradients/filters only (no embedded raster images/data URIs for glow).
Glow is visibly more subtle and sharper than the prior version (reduced blur radius / less spread), while keeping a tech-neon look.
Full logo and icon-only preserve consistent proportions across exported formats (SVG/PNG).

file_operations.description: Create the finalized Tech Neon full logo as an optimized, background-free SVG with a subtle/sharp *vector* glow (no embedded rasters/data-URIs), maintaining correct aspect ratio and clean scaling across mobile/desktop.
Create the finalized Tech Neon icon-only mark as an optimized, background-free SVG with a subtle/sharp *vector* glow (no embedded rasters/data-URIs), suitable for crisp small-size rendering.

requirements.summary: Add required raster exports (app icon + favicon) and white monochrome SVG variants for the finalized logo set.
acceptanceCriteria: 512x512 PNG exists at the specified filename and has transparent background.
32x32 favicon exists at the specified filename and is crisp/legible at 32x32.
White monochrome full logo and icon-only SVGs exist and render as solid white on transparent background.
All exported PNGs are optimized (reasonable file size for web use) and have correct dimensions.

file_operations.description: Add the finalized Tech Neon 512x512 PNG app icon with transparent background and optimized file size.
Add the finalized Tech Neon 32x32 PNG favicon with transparent background, optimized and legible at 32x32.
Ensure the existing Tech Neon icon-only 512x512 PNG matches the finalized icon proportions and subtle/sharp glow direction, remains transparent, and is optimized for web use.
Create the white monochrome full logo SVG (solid white shapes on transparent background), optimized for clean scaling and use on dark backgrounds.
Create the white monochrome icon-only SVG (solid white shapes on transparent background), optimized for clean scaling.

requirements.summary: Update and verify Header/Footer/index.html references to use the correct generated logo + favicon asset paths with no broken legacy references.
acceptanceCriteria: Header logo loads successfully from /assets/generated/styo-logo-tech-neon-full.dim_1200x400.svg (no 404 in browser network panel).
index.html favicon link points to a real file path under /assets/generated/ and loads successfully (no 404).
OpenGraph/Twitter image references remain valid and point to an existing PNG under /assets/generated/ (no 404).
No other references to non-existent legacy logo paths remain in the frontend.

file_operations.description: Verify the header logo uses the final generated asset path /assets/generated/styo-logo-tech-neon-full.dim_1200x400.svg and remove/replace any legacy logo paths if present.
Verify the footer logo uses the final generated asset path /assets/generated/styo-logo-tech-neon-full.dim_1200x400.svg and remove/replace any legacy logo paths if present.
Update the favicon link to /assets/generated/styo-logo-tech-neon-favicon.dim_32x32.png and verify OG/Twitter image meta tags reference an existing PNG under /assets/generated/.

requirements.summary: Document the exact shipped public asset paths used for header/footer logo and favicon via concise developer-facing comments near usage sites.
acceptanceCriteria: Header source path is explicitly documented in code near the Header logo usage.
Favicon source path is explicitly documented in code near the favicon declaration in frontend/index.html (comment) or in an adjacent documented location.
Documented paths match the actual filenames present in frontend/public/assets/generated and load in the running app.

Add a short developer-facing comment adjacent to the footer logo documenting the exact shipped path: /assets/generated/styo-logo-tech-neon-full.dim_1200x400.svg.
